dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Ah, a living being dares to stand before me. What pitiful display of courage.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not here to fight. I seek knowledge about this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge? Mortals like you crave power, not wisdom. Be gone!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Please, I mean no harm. I only wish to understand this land better.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding is beyond your feeble mind. Leave before I make you regret your insolence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for disturbing you. I shall take my leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your departure is wise. Do not return, lest you face the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not leave without the knowledge I seek!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubborn fool! You shall regret defying me!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My intentions are pure. I wish to learn from your ancient wisdom.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom that you cannot comprehend. Your presence here disgusts me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand. I will leave you in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A wise choice. Begone from my sight.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not be dismissed so easily. Share your knowledge with me!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You dare demand from me? Prepare to face the consequences of your arrogance!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek guidance on how to navigate this realm safely.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Safety is an illusion to the weak. Leave before I decide to crush you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave then. Thank you for your words.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave and do not return, or suffer the consequences of your foolishness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your threats do not scare me. I demand your guidance!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal! Your defiance ends here!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am ready to face whatever challenges you present. Let us begin.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a fragile being. Prepare to face the might of the undead.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear nothing. Show me what you are capable of!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your fearlessness will be your downfall. Feel the wrath of the ancient magics!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not yield! Come at me with all your power!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you wish, prepare to be consumed by darkness!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I... I yield. Please, spare me!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Pathetic. I have no mercy for the weak. Farewell, fool.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let's put an end to this. Face me in battle!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Your demise shall be swift and inevitable.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not go down without a fight! Come, face my blade!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your bravery is commendable, but futile. Prepare for your end!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I withdraw. This battle is not worth my life.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Cowardice. I expected no less from a weakling like you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see you are formidable. Let us set aside our differences and join forces.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Join forces? Do you mock me, mortal? I have no need for pitiful allies like you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I assure you, together we can achieve great things. Consider my offer.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your words fall on deaf ears. I have no interest in collaborating with the likes of you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense an opportunity for mutual benefit. Think about what we could accomplish together.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Delusional fool! I will not waste another moment on your drivel. Prepare to face your end!
